title: Paris, Texas
writer: L.M. Kit Carson, Sam Shepard, Walter Donohue
actors: Harry Dean Stanton, Nastassja Kinski, Dean Stockwell
plot: Travis Henderson, an aimless drifter who has been missing for four years, wanders out of the desert and must reconnect with society, himself, his life, and his family.
awards: Won 1 BAFTA Award16 wins & 12 nominations total
